exceptions.exn: In environment f : R -> R x : R H : locally (- x) (fun y : R_UniformSpace => forall k : nat, (k <= 0)%nat -> match k with | 0%nat => True | S n => ex_derive (Derive_n f n) y end) Unable to unify "locally (- x) (fun y : R_UniformSpace => forall k : nat, (k <= 0)%nat -> match k with | 0%nat => True | S n => ex_derive (Derive_n f n) y end)" with "True".
The LHS of Derive_n_comp_opp (Derive_n (fun y : R => _ (- y)) _ _) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment f : R -> R n : nat x : R H : locally (- x) (fun y : R_UniformSpace => forall k : nat, (k <= S n)%nat -> match k with | 0%nat => True | S n => ex_derive (Derive_n f n) y end) Unable to unify "locally (- x) (fun y : R_UniformSpace => forall k : nat, (k <= S n)%nat -> match k with | 0%nat => True | S n => ex_derive (Derive_n f n) y end)" with "ex_derive (Derive_n (fun y : R => f (- y)) n) x".

original: intros H. unfold ex_derive_n in *. destruct n. - intros _ k Hk. apply H. auto. - intros Hk1 k Hk2. rewrite Derive_n_comp_opp. apply H. intros k' Hk'. apply Hk1. lia.
